amendment.description: Amendment sought to redirect $40 million from Detention and Removal Operations to the Office of Investigations within the Immigration and Customs Enforcement account to combat child exploitation and human trafficking.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $40 million in funding within immigration and customs enforcement to combat child exploitation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanchez, Loretta amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 249 (Roll no. 354).

action.text: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Sanchez, Loretta.
